channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- MailPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- MailPress

item.title: CVE-2022-1843|2024-08-03T00:17:00.824Z -- unknown -- mailpress
item.description: The MailPress WordPress plugin through 7.2.1 does not have CSRF checks in various places, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change the settings, purge log files and more via CSRF attacks
